tool_description: Ordering Stack - Ordering API.  Provides functionalities for order lifecycle. Create new order, add items, remove items, abandon order...
name: Ordering
title: Ordering

api_list.name: listLast
api_list.description: Get last orders for user (all states included).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ordering1.p.rapidapi.com/ordering-api/api/orders/last"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ordering1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

test_endpoint.error_description: Full authentication is required to access this resource

api_list.name: getList
api_list.description: Get paginated list of orders. This endpoint is compatible with React AdminOnRest framework to provide DataSource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ordering1.p.rapidapi.com/ordering-api/api/orders"
querystring = {"filter": "{
  "_sort": [],
  "_order": [
    "ASC"
  ],
  "_start": 0,
  "_end": 0,
  "id": "",
  "extId": "",
  "status": "",
  "type": "DELIVERY",
  "completed": true,
  "closed": true,
  "phone": "",
  "mail": "",
  "createdFrom": "",
  "createdTo": "",
  "completedFrom": "",
  "completedTo": "",
  "venue": ""
}"}

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ordering1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, params=querystring)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: removeCoupon
commentOrderLine
splitLines
api_list.description: Split order lines. Makes copies of existing order line with smaller quantities. Sum of quantities must match.

api_list.name: syncOrder
api_list.description: Sync order from external source. It acts as snaptshot and all required order structures must be filled.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ordering1.p.rapidapi.com/ordering-api/api/order/sync"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ordering1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: setDue
deliverOrder
alterExtra
addCoupon
setQueuePos
api_list.description: Manually set queue pos for order. Tenant configuration must allow it.

api_list.name: simpleUpsell
api_list.description: Simple upsell implementation. Uses 'category' extra tag in menu-api service to link categories that should co-exist in order. Configuration is in tenant as 'upselCfg' and consist of list of pairs: 'category1=category2|cat3=cat4'. Which means that if product from 'category1' is present in order, there should also be product from 'category2'. If it is missing upsell suggests 3 products from 'category2'.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ordering1.p.rapidapi.com/ordering-api/simple-upsell"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ordering1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: alterLinesExtra
cancelOrder
api_list.description: Cancel order. Cancelling is available for restaurant staff. Involves e-payments refund. If refund fails - cancelling does not take place.

api_list.name: paymentUpdate
addFiscalize
api_list.description: Add fiscal information to order. This should reflect printed fiscal strip.

api_list.name: processedLineOrder
attach
appendLineOrder
setAddress
processingLineOrder
requestFiscal
api_list.description: Request fiscal data for order. Data is returnet through websocket.

api_list.name: simpleLoyalty
api_list.description: Simple loyalty implementation with '3-parts sets 10% off' and 'every third item - half price'. It uses product extra tags 'PART' which should take one of values: 'main', 'side', 'drink'. This endpoint counts every value and tries to combine them in sets (one 'main', one 'size', one 'drink'). There is also 'BULK3' tag which works as a 'third product of this kind (id) for half price'.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ordering1.p.rapidapi.com/ordering-api/simple-loyalty"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ordering1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: abandonOrder
api_list.description: Abandon order. Only not completed orders can be abandoned this way.

voidLineOrder
detach
verifyOrderPayment
api_list.description: Verify order by ID if it can be paid.

api_list.name: changeVenues
changeQuantities
kdsTraceView
claimOrder
api_list.description: Claim order. This is used to attach additional user to order. User can be just another user, waiter or technical account for kiosk, etc.
